roleset.name: cough, hack, quickly pushing air from the lungs
roleset.note: COUGH-V NOTES: Frames file for 'cough' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No Verbnet entry. (from cough.01-v predicate notes)
COUGHING-N NOTES: Corresponds to cough.01. Framed by anwen april 2011 (from coughing.01-n)
COUGH-N NOTES: Based on frame for cough-v.01 (from cough.01-n)

role.descr: sputum or other entity expelled from/through respiratory tract

example.name: cough-v: expectorant
example.text: Just when [Ms. Gruberova]-1 sat down away from her guests *trace*-1 to cough in private , her salon began sliding around the stage; her country hideaway also has a very active set of drapes.

example.name: cough-v: arg2
example.text: He coughed some phlegm from his throat and spat through the window.

example.name: cough-v: DIR
example.text: we might see the bear coughing out a hair extension and a broken Beyoncé CD ."
example.arg: a hair extension and a broken Beyoncé CD
a hair extension and a broken Beyoncé CD

example.name: cough-v: arg1
example.text: The baby coughed a rough cough directly into her red ear.

example.name: cough-v: DIR
example.text: She has just coughed up some mucus with bright red blood.
example.arg: some mucus with bright red blood

example.name: coughing-n: Arg0
example.text: Bob's coughing had only gotten worse with the antibiotics.

example.name: cough-n
example.text: The patient's cough was improving after a change of medication.

roleset.name: say in a coughing manner
roleset.note: COUGH-V NOTES: Frames file for 'cough' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No Verbnet entry. (from cough.02-v predicate notes)

example.name: smoke inhalation
example.text: "I think I burned the wienies," coughed John.
example.arg: I think I burned the wienies

roleset.name: give under duress
roleset.note: COUGH_UP-V NOTES: might take benefactive? (from cough.03-v)

example.name: violent tendencies
example.text: Mary kept hitting John until he coughed up $50.
